about_the_game:
Hey, I'm Thomas, the developer behind Kingdom: New Lands and Cloud Gardens. I've been working on a new thing that elaborates on the style & themes of those games. It's still early days, and honestly, I'm still piecing things together, but I'm excited to share it with you.

About the Game


Explore a vast abandoned world in your trusty truck. A near-future wasteland, rendered in 3D pixel art, holding faded memories of what used to be.

What to Expect (So Far)


  • Exploration: Venture across vast procedural landscapes, punctuated with hand-made landmarks.
  • Fun Vehicle Physics: Drive and unlock different vehicles to make your way through the wasteland.
  • Quiet Moments: The vibe? Mostly contemplative. It's about the journey, the sights, and the stories they might tell.

I genuinely appreciate you stopping by. If you're curious about where this is heading, hit that wishlist button. It'd be cool to have you along for the ride as this project evolves.
